Name: American Crew Pomade
Description: A high-hold, high-shine pomade that gives hair a classic, polished look. American Crew's Pomade is perfect for creating sleek, smooth styles with a strong hold.

Name: Jack Black Beard Oil
Description: A lightweight, non-greasy beard oil that conditions and softens facial hair while providing a subtle shine. Jack Black's Beard Oil is perfect for maintaining a healthy, well-groomed beard.

Name: Baxter of California Shaving Cream
Description: A luxury shaving cream that provides a close, smooth shave. Baxter of California's Shaving Cream is formulated with natural ingredients that soothe and protect the skin.

Name: Beardbrand Comb
Description: A high-quality, handmade comb that is perfect for detangling and shaping beards. Beardbrand's Comb is crafted from premium materials that won't damage facial hair.

Name: Suavecito Pomade
Description: A medium-hold, water-soluble pomade that is easy to wash out. Suavecito's Pomade is perfect for creating classic, vintage styles with a natural finish.

Name: Uppercut Deluxe Shampoo
Description: A premium, sulfate-free shampoo that gently cleanses hair and scalp. Uppercut Deluxe's Shampoo is perfect for maintaining healthy, well-groomed hair.

Name: Beardbrand Utility Balm
Description: A versatile, all-in-one balm that conditions, styles, and protects facial hair. Beardbrand's Utility Balm is perfect for maintaining a healthy, well-groomed beard.

Name: Baxter of California After Shave
Description: A soothing, hydrating after-shave balm that helps to prevent irritation and razor burn. Baxter of California's After Shave is perfect for maintaining healthy, smooth skin.

Name: Jack Black Lip Balm
Description: A moisturizing, SPF 25 lip balm that protects and nourishes the lips. Jack Black's Lip Balm is perfect for maintaining healthy, hydrated lips.

Name: American Crew Fiber
Description: A high-hold, low-shine styling cream that gives hair a natural, textured look. American Crew's Fiber is perfect for creating messy, spiky hairstyles with a strong hold.

Name: Beardbrand Sea Salt Spray
Description: A texturizing spray that gives hair a tousled, beachy look. Beardbrand's Sea Salt Spray is perfect for creating natural, effortless styles with a matte finish.

Name: Baxter of California Clay Pomade
Description: A medium-hold pomade that gives hair a matte, natural finish. Baxter of California's Clay Pomade is perfect for creating textured, modern hairstyles.

Name: Jack Black Face Moisturizer
Description: A lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer that hydrates and protects the skin. Jack Black's Face Moisturizer is perfect for maintaining a healthy, youthful complexion.

Name: American Crew Grooming Cream
Description: A versatile, all-in-one styling cream that gives hair a natural, polished look. American Crew's Grooming Cream is perfect for creating classic, sophisticated hairstyles.

Name: Uppercut Deluxe Pomade
Description: A high-hold, water-based pomade that gives hair a classic, shiny finish. Uppercut Deluxe's Pomade is perfect for creating sleek, vintage hairstyles.
